Uses of Class
prng.SecureRandomBuilder

  • Packages that use SecureRandomBuilder 
    Package Description
    prng
    Secure Random Number Generation in Java.

    • Uses of SecureRandomBuilder in prng

      Subclasses of SecureRandomBuilder in prng 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  SecureRandomBuilder.CipherBuilder
      Create Cipher based RNGs.
      (package private) static class  SecureRandomBuilder.HashBuilder
      Create Hash based RNGs.
      (package private) static class  SecureRandomBuilder.HmacBuilder
      Create HMAC based RNGs.
      Methods in prng that return SecureRandomBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.cipher()
      Create a secure random based upon an AES cipher.
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.entropy(byte[] data)
      Specify the bytes for initial entropy provided to the RNG.
      static SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.hash()
      Create a secure random based upon a secure hash algorithm (SHA).
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.hash(SecureRandomBuilder.Hash newHash)
      Specify the hash algorithm used by a hash or HMAC based RNG.
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.CipherBuilder.hash(SecureRandomBuilder.Hash newHash) 
      static SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.hmac()
      Create a secure random based upon a hash based message authentication code (HMAC)
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.laziness(int lazy)
      How lazy is the generator when it comes to requesting new entropy? NIST refer to this parameter as "resistance" but lower values are more secure than higher ones.
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.nonce(byte[] data)
      Specify the bytes for a nonce used to initialise the RNG.
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.personalization(byte[] data)
      Specify the bytes for personalization used to initialise the RNG.
      SecureRandomBuilder SecureRandomBuilder.source(SecureRandomBuilder.Source newSource)
      Specify the seed data source.
      Constructors in prng with parameters of type SecureRandomBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomService(Provider provider, String algorithm, SecureRandomBuilder builder)
      New instance
